mapper.sql: id, ent_identity, ent_name, ent_document_type, ent_credit_code, registration_number, tax_registration_number, institution_code, representative, representative_type, representative_num, registered_capital, major_shareholder, business_scope, registration_authority, telephone, municipality, city, county, address, business_contact, mobile_phone, email_address, zip_code, web_site, code_file, business_license, electronic_file, person_idcard, tax_number, open_account_file, financial_file, organization_electronic_file, ent_logo
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.* FROM gyl_information t1 INNER JOIN gyl_account t2 ON t1.id=t2.information_id WHERE t2.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into gyl_information (id, ent_identity, ent_name, ent_document_type, ent_credit_code, registration_number, tax_registration_number, institution_code, representative, representative_type, representative_num, registered_capital, major_shareholder, business_scope, registration_authority, telephone, municipality, city, county, address, business_contact, mobile_phone, email_address, zip_code, web_site, code_file, business_license, electronic_file, person_idcard, tax_number, open_account_file, financial_file, organization_electronic_file, account_id, ent_logo) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entDocumentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegistrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institutionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representativeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{representativeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorShareholder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{municipality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{electronicFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openAccountFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financialFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationElectronicFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
